original:
<DIALOG2>I thought
if I got all the
necessary equipment,<NEXT>I could be a Digger...<NEXT>But then I found out
you need a license as
well![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I make the machines
I use on the job by<NEXT>putting together
different parts I
find...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I have to buy some
parts to fix my...
my robot...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>If you're a serious
Digger,<NEXT>you should buy as many
Life Gauge parts as
you can![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wonder why they
have the lights on
so low in here?<NEXT>I mean, it fits the
place's atmosphere,<NEXT>but it's hard to
see![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>What kind of store
is this?<NEXT>They've got lots of
cute little things on
sale,<NEXT>but what are they
used for?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm thinking about
quitting my job and
becoming a Digger.<NEXT>'Course, I suppose
I'll have to work
out a lot if I want<NEXT>to be as strong as
you are![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>How's your Buster
gun holding up?<NEXT>Find any good
power-ups lately?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I've been in this
business a long
time, and I can<NEXT>tell you one thing
--that noise was
made by something<NEXT>very big moving or
being moved...<NEXT>Something bigger
than a Sub-Gate...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We're always
getting new stuff<NEXT>in, so be sure to
come back often![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You'll regret it if
you don't buy
something just<NEXT>because you don't
want to spend any
money!<NEXT>You should always
buy what you need,
when you need it![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98][0xf1]2[0xb0][0xff]<DIALOG2>Hey, MegaMan!
What's up?[0x9b][0xbb][0x0][0xb1][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hey, Hippopotamus!
What's up?[0x9b][0xbb][0x0][0xb1][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Why don't you take
a look around?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0][0xb3][0xff]<DIALOG2>How's it going?<NEXT>You're really becoming
quite the star, aren't
you?<NEXT>Makes me proud to
have you as a regular
customer![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Paints? Hmmmm...
I don't know much
about that...<NEXT>There's a lot of stores
in the market--<NEXT>why don't you go
ask around?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8Junk shop lady
"That's a stuffed
Reaverbot--<NEXT>it's an old family
heirloom...<NEXT>We call it Rover.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]?[0x0][0xb9][0xff][0x98][0xf2]2[0xb8][0xff][0xa1][0x0][0x0][0x80]1[0x80]1[0x0][0x0][0x80][0xff][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8Junk shop lady

you go underground,<NEXT>looking for old

taking him so long...<NEXT>Hey, little blue
boy, would you be<NEXT>willing to go
find him for me?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80][0xb6][0xb7][0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8[0x96]?[0x0]"You will? Oh,

"Did you see that
old beat-up car<NEXT>outside the city
walls?<NEXT>That's the car we
used as our
support car<NEXT>when we were
younger...<NEXT>Anyway, you can
have it if you
want--<NEXT>it doesn't run
anymore, but you
should be able to<NEXT>use it to exchange
Buster parts
and stuff...[0x9b][0x95][0x0][0xbe][0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You're looking
for parts for your
ship, right?<NEXT>Sorry, but I don't
have anything like
that here...<NEXT>But I've got
weapons and
upgrades and<NEXT>other stuff I can
sell you...<NEXT>Come back again
sometime and take
a look...<NEXT>Ummm...What did
you say your name
was?<NEXT>[0x9d][0x86][0x0][0x0][0xab]6[0x9c]V[0x0][0x92][0x0]1[0xe9]MegaMan
[0x9c]V[0x0][0x92][0x11]1[0xe9]Hippopotamus[0x9e][0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x0][0xbf][0xc0][0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x96][0xf3]2<DIALOG2>MegaMan...That's

What kind of name
is that?<NEXT>Well, anyway, come
back soon,
Mr. Hippopotamus![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98][0xf3]2[0xc3][0xff]<DIALOG2>Oh, you came back![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>My husband and
I used to go on<NEXT>digs when we were
younger...Huh? Oh,<NEXT>I was the Digger
and he was my
Spotter![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Parts for a
flying ship?
Hmmm...<NEXT>You might have
better luck<NEXT>digging for 'em
yourself...<NEXT>If you've got a
Class B Digger's
License,<NEXT>you can get into
the ruins in the
southern forest,<NEXT>or the one up
north in the
Clozer Woods.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Are you a Digger?<NEXT>I'm here doing research
on the ruins of this
island here...<NEXT>There sure are a lot
of them, aren't
there?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I heard you're
checking out the
Sub-Gates...<NEXT>I guess that means
you have a Class A<NEXT>Digger's License
then...<NEXT>If I had a license,
I'd love to research
the connection<NEXT>between the Sub-
Gates and the Main
Gate myself![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98][0xf1]2[0xc7][0xff]<DIALOG2>You did it,
MegaMan!<NEXT>Now I'll be able
to dig all over
the island!<NEXT>Just kidding--I
think I'll stick<NEXT>with the little
ruins near the
city...<NEXT>I mean, there're
still all sorts of<NEXT>Reaverbots in the
other ruins, right?<NEXT>Anyway, take care
of yourself![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You did it,
